text: April Janet PearsonBirths, Marriages & Deaths Index of England & Wales, 1984-2004. Gives name at birth as "April Janet Pearson". (born 23 January 1989 in Bristol) is an English actress. In early 2007, Pearson appeared in the first series of Skins on E4 as Michelle Richardson. She has appeared in Casualty, playing four different characters. April currently lives in Bristol. She was head girl at Colston's Girls' School. ==References== ==Other websites== * *April Pearson Interview at The National Student Magazine Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Bristol Category:British child actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
title: April Pearson
